title: [PS2]  Sega Classics Collection - NTSC DVD5
description:
Splashdown: Rides Gone Wild ( Splashdown: Rides Gone Wild for the PlayStation 2 is a sequel to the original Splashdown for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox.)
Superb watercraft racing with a roller coaster twist? Get your e-tickets here.

Info:
Published by: THQ
Developed by: Rainbow Studios
Genre: Racing
Release Date:
United States: August 4, 2003
UK: September 1, 2003
-----------------------------------------------------------------

NTSC-U
Tested ISO burned both on PS2 slim and fat models.

Burned with Alcohol 120%

*Amazing gameplay
*Beautiful graphics 
*Be sure to use component cables
*You may consider an external upscalling with real scalling to HDMI 720p - 1080p for better results on newer HDTV which have poor upscalling 
* Works with PS2 Emulator

Enjoy this game :)

P.S: I included the PAL cover because I can't find the NTSC full size
